relation: I do not live on campus, I am enrolled in an online program, but Naperville is nearby which as great restaurants.
I do not live on campus.
The program I am in is not easy, but the hard work will pay off.
Take time to speak with your advisors, they are a great resource. Utilize the librarian and writing assistance. The online library page is very helpful with research.
Very professional staff from admissions to instructors. The program I am enrolled in is very stimulating and rewarding. The school has a great reputation, for good reason.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Eric from West Chicago, IL 06/15/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 40 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students A small & close knit school. Very helpful & freindly admin. staff, small University surroundings. Look forward to attending in the fall.
